p: The geographical distribution of COVID-19 covers all continents except Antarctica. Epidemiologists in Wuhan believe the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market in Wuhan to be the point of origin of SARS-CoV-2, due to its connection to the trading of live wild animals (WHO January 22, 2020) ( Zhou et al., 2020a). COVID-19 is highly contagious, with a basic reproduction number ( R 0) of between 1.4 and 6.5, and can be easily spread through coughs and sneezes, talking to infected persons, and touching the eyes, nose, or mouth after touching a contaminated surface ( Liu et al., 2020).
